org.mozilla.gecko

Interface WakeLockDelegate


  • public interface WakeLockDelegate
    A WakeLockDelegate is responsible for acquiring and release wake-locks.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String LOCK_AUDIO_PLAYING
      Wake-lock for the audio-playing, eqaul to LOCK_CPU.
      static String LOCK_CPU
      Wake-lock for the CPU.
      static String LOCK_SCREEN
      Wake-lock for the screen.
      static String LOCK_VIDEO_PLAYING
      Wake-lock for the video-playing, eqaul to LOCK_SCREEN..
      static int LOCKS_COUNT 
      static int STATE_LOCKED_BACKGROUND
      The wake-lock is held by a background window.
      static int STATE_LOCKED_FOREGROUND
      The wake-lock is held by a foreground window.
      static int STATE_UNLOCKED
      No one holds the wake-lock.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setWakeLockState(String lock, int state)
      Set a wake-lock to a specified state.

    • Method Detail

      • setWakeLockState

        void setWakeLockState(String lock,
                      int state)
        Set a wake-lock to a specified state. Called from the Gecko thread.
        Parameters:
        lock - Wake-lock to set from one of the LOCK_* constants.
        state - New wake-lock state from one of the STATE_* constants.
